title: march 16: red letter (with Bea Miller)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the publication of Nathaniel Hawthorne’s timeless novel The Scarlet Letter. Then she talks about a recent music chart controversy. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
